host.label: Carbon Black Cloud instance hostname
host.description: Specify the IP address or hostname of the Carbon Black Cloud instance so that IBM Cloud Pak for Security can communicate with it.

port.label: Host Port
port.description: Set the port number that is associated with the Host name or IP.

help.label: Need additional help?
help.description: More details on the data source setting can be found in the specified link.

sslVerify.label: Verify SSL certificate
sslVerify.description: Verify the SSL cerificate of the Carbon Black Cloud data source. The default is True).
